body.para: The following control items are provided for manual operation:

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

body.para: Only one item can be enable (controlled) at any one time. Press the button to select the item. The button will be highlighted in yellow once it is enabled.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-25px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:25px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:25px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-25px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:25px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:25px left ;
li.text: According to machine fixture configuration, some of the control items may not exist.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-25px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:25px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:25px left ;
li.text: The control item can only be selected when the screen is in “Unlock” mode.

body.para: For each control item, there is a pair of indication lamps and control buttons. The control buttons are only enabled when the corresponding item is selected.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
